subject: Re : Unable to run the Servlet
msgSnippet: Hi, Please post any Cactus related questions to jakarta- commons@jakarta.apache.org (to subscribe send an email to jakarta-
messageBody:
Hi,
Please post any Cactus related questions to jakarta-
commons@... (to subscribe send an email to jakarta-
commons-subscribe@...). If you need directions go and
check the Cactius web site at http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus

Thanks
P.S.: I'll answer your question on that newsgroup ... :)

Vincent

--- Dans junit@e..., "Sandhya Sree" <sandhya.sree@m...> a Ã©crit
>
> Hi,
> Iam facing the problem while trying to run the Servlet
using Cactus
> (though i have done the complete configuration).
> I have registered the ServletRedirector in the
cactus.properties file and
> still iam getting the exception as java.io.FileNotFoundException:
> http://172.20.10.100/PayMate/ServletRedirector
>
> Iam using ApacheJserv1.1 ?As this supports only Jsdk2.0,iam
doubtful that
> whether this tool is compatible with servlet.jar2.0?
>
> In log files it is showing the following error
> [31/05/2001 12:02:57:126] (ERROR) ajp12: Servlet Error:
> java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: javax.servlet.ServletContext: method
> setAttribute(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V not found:
> javax.servlet.ServletContext: method
> setAttribute(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V not found
>
> From this it is clearly understandable that Jsdk2.0 which iam using
doesn't have
> setAttribute method and is there any lower version of cactus which
is flexible
> with Jsdk2.0
>
> With out using higher version of Jsdk is there any solution for
this?
>
> waiting for the earliest reply
> regards,
> Sandhya Sree
